definition: not subject to death, any supernatural being worshipped as controlling some part of the world or some aspect of life or who is the personification of a force
details:
adjective
- not subject to death
noun
- any supernatural being worshipped as controlling some part of the world or some aspect of life or who is the personification of a force
= synonyms: god, divinity, deity
- a person (such as an author) of enduring fame
= example: a person (such as an author) of enduring fame
